pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is an ebuild fork that applies subdir_mount and crypt_root_plain patches.
3.x is stable. 4.x is experimental.

use.flag: Adds mounting subdirectory support. Used for mounting muslx32 or stage2 or stage3 images in place produced from crossdev and mounting them directly at /usr/$CTARGET without risk of damage caused by human error replacing / with /usr/$CTARGET.
Enable support for Luks disk encryption using sys-fs/cryptsetup
Prefer system firmware sys-kernel/linux-firmware over local copy.
Enable support for the Clang/LLVM toolchain
